text: (mē andamaṭama) movunṭa pera nuhugē janatāvada, ovungen pasu pæmiṇi (sǣma) samuhayakda (apagē āyāvan) boru kaḷaha. tavada (ovungen) sǣma janatāvakma taman veta pæmiṇi dūtayinva (ghātanaya kirīmaṭada, sirabārayaṭa) gænīmaṭada adahas kaḷaha. tavada satyaya vināśa kara dæmīma san̆dahā boru kāraṇāvan magin (ovun samaga) tarka kaḷaha. ebævin ovunva (dan̆ḍuvama magin) api allā gattemu. ebævin (ovunṭa niyama karana lada) magē dan̆ḍuvama kesē tibuṇēda (yanna avadhānaya karanu mænava)
